metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24757 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: libde265 v1.0.10 was discovered to contain a NULL pointer dereference inthe put_unweighted_pred_16_fallback function at fallback-motion.cc. Thisvulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via acrafted input file.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
